TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonTabsPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo

Docs.summary: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of tabs in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RibbonTabsPanel provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

Docs.param: The size that the needs to position its child elements.
Docs.summary: Positions and sizes the child elements in this .
Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabsPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

Docs.summary: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Docs.value: The horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
